chapters.title: Chapter 7: Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: Deira ni Ghaline t'Bashere, p. 146 (176)—Davram Bashere's wife, and Faile's mother. She is about a head taller than her husband, and is big for a woman. She has black hair. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere; Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline.
